query:
CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS `defectInspections` (
  `id` int AUTO_INCREMENT NOT NULL,
  `defectId` int NOT NULL,
  `inspectorId` int NOT NULL,
  `inspectionType` enum('initial', 'reinspection') NOT NULL,
  `result` enum('passed', 'failed', 'pending') NOT NULL DEFAULT 'pending',
  `comments` text,
  `photoUrls` text,
  `inspectedAt` timestamp NOT NULL DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP,
  `createdAt` timestamp NOT NULL DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP,
  CONSTRAINT `defectInspections_id` PRIMARY KEY(`id`),
  INDEX `defectIdx` (`defectId`),
  INDEX `inspectorIdx` (`inspectorId`),
  INDEX `typeIdx` (`inspectionType`)
);

  `id` int AUTO_INCREMENT NOT NULL,
  `defectId` int NOT NULL,
  `inspectorId` int NOT NULL,
  `inspectionType` enum('initial', 'reinspection') NOT NULL,
  `result` enum('passed', 'failed', 'pending') NOT NULL DEFAULT 'pending',
  `comments` text,
  `photoUrls` text,
  `inspectedAt` timestamp NOT NULL DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP,
  `createdAt` timestamp NOT NULL DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP,
  CONSTRAINT `defectInspections_id` PRIMARY KEY(`id`),
  INDEX `defectIdx` (`defectId`),
  INDEX `inspectorIdx` (`inspectorId`),
  INDEX `typeIdx` (`inspectionType`)
);
